title: Legacy Morgana Skin
body:
Okay so i was looking over what is coming out of the vault and i noticed they have Sinful Succulent {{champion:25}} as a new legacy skin, given how recent it must have gone into the vault as it was gifted to me by a friend (and no it wasn't as a mystery gift) i was wondering why bring that one out? i have been waiting since i started playing for them to open the vault and bring out Exiled {{champion:25}} as (other then the victorious skin) i am only missing that one skin. 

so i guess all that rambling and my question is simply why make Sinful Succulent a legacy and bring it out of the vault already instead of the Exiled skin. :s seems i am probably stupid but it seems to me a bit of a waste.

replies.body: Sinful Succulent is a skin that is going INTO the vault as opposed to one that is coming OUT.
i turt to same wit artonaut temo
wow i feel stupid, i thought tey meant it was coming out of the vault lmao.........im an idot lol
